For some reason Markdown does not render on <denchmark-link:https://pypi.org/project/livelossplot/>https://pypi.org/project/livelossplot/</denchmark-link> . I have no idea why - I did follow the guidelines in : <denchmark-code>long_description=readme(), long_description_content_type='text/markdown' </denchmark-code>
Vide:
https://packaging.python.org/guides/making-a-pypi-friendly-readme/ https://dustingram.com/articles/2018/03/16/markdown-descriptions-on-pypi pypa/packaging-problems#46 pypa/warehouse#3664 pypa/warehouse#3438
(I do have up-to-date versions of twine, setuptools and wheel ) EDIT: Most likely an error with : <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pypa/twine/issues/420>pypa/twine#420</denchmark-link> (there is a fix, but not yet released). Any help appreciated!

comments.comment: Update: twine=1.12.1 did cause this error. After installing pip install git+git://github.com/pypa/twine@master (twine=1.12.2, not yet released) it works.
